name: Super Eye Tracking Battle Collection
description:
3 Games that uses the Tobii eye tracking made in 48 hours for #Cecinestpasunjeu game jam.

Made in 48 hours by a team of two:
Ida (Design, sound, Art) 
Malo (Design, Dev)

List of the 3 games:

-"Voiture":  Drive a car with your eyes. Just a simple test.

-"Super Kick Gaze Hero" : A fighting game played with the eye tracking. look at your character to defend, look at the enemy to attack.

-"Bataille des oeils": A competitive 2 players eye tracking game where you have to keep the look of the other player in your zone. (played with one eye for each player)

/!\ Attention: /!\
These games are all installation games that are played with Tobii Eye tracking. In order to make them work you need to get the mouse follow the tobii. And, of course, an Eye tracker.

(This mean you can play them with a simple mouse but they're intended to be played with eyes)

We used Autohotkey to make that possible, so you might need to download it in order to play (find info in the "readme" file.)
